## WhereFilter type

A filter constraint that can be applied to database queries. Consists of a field name (in Firestore dotted notation), a Firestore filter operator, and a value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type WhereFilter = [string, WhereFilterOp, any];
```
